FuncDef:
The consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type command configures an M-LAG consistency check whitelist of the M-LAG module.
The undo consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type command cancels the configured M-LAG consistency check whitelist of the M-LAG module. The consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type command configures an M-LAG consistency check whitelist of the M-LAG module. The undo consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type command cancels the configured M-LAG consistency check whitelist of the M-LAG module. By default, no M-LAG consistency check whitelist is configured for the M-LAG module.
CLIs: consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type { m-lag-member-num | m-lag-id | peer-link-exclude-vlan | m-lag-ipv4-address | m-lag-ipv6-address | m-lag-election-mode }
undo consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type { m-lag-member-num | m-lag-id | peer-link-exclude-vlan | m-lag-ipv4-address | m-lag-ipv6-address | m-lag-election-mode }
consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type { m-lag-member-num | m-lag-id | peer-link-exclude-vlan | m-lag-ipv4-address | m-lag-election-mode }
undo consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type { m-lag-member-num | m-lag-id | peer-link-exclude-vlan | m-lag-ipv4-address | m-lag-election-mode }

ParaDef.Info:
Configuration of removing a peer-link interface from a VLAN.
-

IPv4 address for a dynamic routing protocol over M-LAG.
-

IPv6 address for a dynamic routing protocol over M-LAG.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
-

Examples: [*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type m-lag-id
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type peer-link-exclude-vlan
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type m-lag-ipv4-address
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type m-lag-ipv6-address
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type m-lag-election-mode
[*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module m-lag service-type m-lag-member-num
